scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Adoration of the Magi. The Virgin Mary, wearing a blue mantle and a golden halo, holds the Christ Child, who is also depicted with a golden halo and is reaching towards a chalice. One of the Magi, kneeling and wearing a crown, offers a golden chalice. Another Magus, standing and wearing a green robe and a crown, holds a golden chalice. A third Magus, standing and wearing a blue robe adorned with golden fleur-de-lis and a crown, looks towards the kneeling Magus. Behind the figures is a stylized architectural structure with arches and decorative patterns, suggesting an indoor setting or a representation of a building. The background features a patterned textile and a blue sky with golden wavy lines.
